entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
